Name: halfbit
AboutMe:
I am developing software since the dark age, I started in ~1985. Languages: c/c++, PHP, ruby (starting as noob (remind me to remove 'noob' in 3 years, 'starting' in 48 :-)), others

I like good frameworks, i dont like frameworks and I hate "modern programming that changes every half of a year". I am a developer not a model

Masterpices:

  • a CAD/CAM printed circuit board design system with a 386 in late 80's (the computer your daddy was working with :-)

  • a software distribution solution early 2000 for a large concern (HAL still hates me for that), that is still in use (although adopted - ever had a 15 years lasting software?)
